page.title: 18FARMER'S WIFE IN KNOCK
page.content: Her day begins at 6am & is punctuated with preparing food for cats,dogs, puppies,hens,ducks & for the men work- ing on the farm:breakfast,10 o'clocks, lunch,tea & supper.In between, she usually works in the house or gardens, washes and cleans.She visits Appleby once a week,but otherwise shops at the travelling vans.When her husband goes to the Auction in Penrith she often goes with him,but otherwise likes to get about the village to meet & help people,especially the older folk & the children.She has little time for watching T.V. but likes knitting & collects flowers for pressing when walking the dogs.She has her hands full at present with 2 sheepdog puppies.Her day ends with hot drinks at about 10pm.
